list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The poor little mite is crying.

list_definition.definition: a type of very small insect

list_ex_of_english: Down these crevices the mites gradually work, almost always in narrow vertical strips, and their activities produce the quite definite streaks upon the scale walls.
